reference.title: Message hub
reference.shortdesc: The message hub REST APIs allow you to configure message hubs, endpoints, connection policies, and messaging policies. You can create, update, view, and delete message hubs, endpoints, connection policies, and messaging policies.

section.p: For more information about viewing message hubs, endpoints, connection policies, and messaging policies see .
For more information about deleting message hubs, endpoints, connection policies, and messaging policies, see .
